pages.text: Giant spiders may be gone but the need for string exists. Mineshafts offer a limited quantity, and other locations from the past era offer much less. $(br2)Solution is simple - cotton.
$(br2)Cotton seeds can be purchased from village farmers or from wandering clerics (they will come to you eventually). Seeds are not healthy to eat (even for chickens).

$(br2)Cotton is also found in the wild - in plains and forests. Wild cotton grows slower than that on maintained farmland. Either kind can be harvested by hand (right-click) or mechanical harvesters. A matured bush might give you some seeds in addition to cotton bolls.
